Description: SHORT TERM RENTAL 6-8 MONTH LEASE SINGLE FAMILY HOME FOR RENT 3 BEDROOMS 1 1/2 BATHS OPEN CONCEPT LIVING ROOM DINING ROOM AND KITCHEN HARDWOOD FLOORS - TILE EIK LARGE ENCLOSED BACK PORCH /3 SEASON 3 BEDROOMS AND FULL BATH ON 2ND FLOOR LARGE FENCED IN BACK YARD PET FRIENDLY MINUTES TO MADELINE ENGLISH SCHOOL WALK OR BUS TO T MALDEN OR MEDFORD ORANGE LINE TO VIEW CONTACT LOUANNE
